results.title: Breaking Bad
results.creator_credit: Peter Gould, George Mastras, Thomas Schnauz, Stewart Lyons, Karen Moore, Moira Walley-Beckett, Bryan Cranston, Diane Mercer, Kathleen Detoro, Robb Wilson King, Patty Lin, John Shiban, Melissa Bernstein, Sam Catlin, Sony Pictures Television Studios, High Bridge Entertainment and Gran Via Productions
results.brief_description: When Walter White, a New Mexico chemistry teacher, is diagnosed with Stage III cancer and given a prognosis of only two years left to live. He becomes filled with a sense of fearlessness and an unrelenting desire to secure his family’s financial future at any cost as he enters the dangerous world of drugs and crime.

constellations_other.name: The power of alternate endings
constellations_other.description: This Constellation about alternate perspectives, dream states, sitcoms and spin-offs was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.

He becomes filled with a sense of fearlessness and an unrelenting desire to secure his family’s financial future at any cost as he enters the dangerous world of drugs and crime.

results.title: Bombshell
results.creator_credit: Colleen Atwood, Jay Roach, Margaret Riley, Norie Varga, A.J. Dix, Robert Graf, Charles Randolph, Michelle Graham, Lighthouse Management + Media, Denver and Delilah Productions, Bron Studios, Annapurna Pictures, Creative Wealth Media Finance, Lionsgate, Endeavor Content, Charlize Theron, Mark Ricker, Aaron L. Gilbert and Beth Kono
results.headline_credit: Canada and United States of America, 2019
results.brief_description: Bombshell is a revealing look inside the most powerful and controversial media empire of all time; and the explosive story of the women who brought down the infamous man who created it.

constellations_other.name: Elevator Operator: Up and down, the on-screen gift of elevators
constellations_other.description: Inspired by Courtney Barnett playing an elevator operator in her hit song of the same name, we look at how they're used on-screen for comedy, drama and suspense, with the small, confined boxes forcing characters to physically confront each other.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Colleen Atwood, Jay Roach, Margaret Riley, Norie Varga, A.J. Dix, Robert Graf, Charles Randolph, Michelle Graham, Lighthouse Management + Media, Denver and Delilah Productions, Bron Studios, Annapurna Pictures, Creative Wealth Media Finance, Lionsgate, Endeavor Content, Charlize Theron, Mark Ricker, Aaron L. Gilbert and Beth Kono

results.title: Blue Planet II
results.creator_credit: BBC Natural History Unit, BBC and Mark Brownlow
results.brief_description: There is nowhere more powerful and unforgiving yet more beautiful and compelling than the ocean. Join us and explore the greatest yet least known parts of our planet.

constellations_other.name: There is no Planet B
constellations_other.description: While the climate emergency is very real, inspiring thousands and thousands of students to strike, documentaries, animated movies and dystopian genre films have warned about a world ravaged by global warming.

results.creator_credit_for_label: BBC Natural History Unit, BBC and Mark Brownlow
results.description: There is nowhere more powerful and unforgiving yet more beautiful and compelling than the ocean. Join us and explore the greatest yet least known parts of our planet.
description_for_label: There is nowhere more powerful and unforgiving yet more beautiful and compelling than the ocean. Join us and explore the greatest yet least known parts of our planet.

results.title: Blindspotting
results.creator_credit: Thomas S. Hammock and Emily Batson
results.brief_description: Collin must make it through his final three days of probation for a chance at a new beginning.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

results.description: Collin must make it through his final three days of probation for a chance at a new beginning. He and his troublemaking childhood best friend, Miles, work as movers, and when Collin witnesses a police shooting, the two men’s friendship is tested as they grapple with identity and their changed realities in the rapidly-gentrifying neighborhood they grew up in.
description_for_label: Collin must make it through his final three days of probation for a chance at a new beginning. He and his troublemaking childhood best friend, Miles, work as movers, and when Collin witnesses a police shooting, the two men’s friendship is tested as they grapple with identity and their changed realities in the rapidly-gentrifying neighborhood they grew up in.

video_links.name: Blindspotting (2018 Movie) Official Trailer - Daveed Diggs, Rafael Casal

results.title: Blade Runner 2049
results.headline_credit: Canada, Hungary, Mexico, Spain, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2017
results.brief_description: Thirty years after Blade Runner, a new blade runner K unearths a secret that has the potential to plunge society into chaos. K’s discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, a former LAPD blade runner who has been missing for 30 years.

constellations_other.name: Alternate histories and futures
constellations_other.description: Sue Ford's Egami reimagines contemporary life through a feminist and colonial lens.

constellations_other.name: The drama and nuance of silhouette
constellations_other.description: Ali Gumillya Baker uses silhouette to evocative effect in her work reimagining the colonial gaze. The lighting technique has long been employed by filmmakers for its ability to dramatically convey a wide variety of emotions in everything from film noir to animation and whimsy.

constellations_other.name: Sci-fi miniatures
constellations_other.description: As filmmaking technologies have changed and evolved over the decades, much like audiences, miniatures have endured as one of the most effective film special effects.

results.headline_credit_for_label: Canada, Hungary, Mexico, Spain, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2017
results.description: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner, LAPD Officer K, unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what’s left of society into chaos. K’s discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, a former LAPD blade runner who has been missing for 30 years.
description_for_label: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner, LAPD Officer K, unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what’s left of society into chaos. K’s discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, a former LAPD blade runner who has been missing for 30 years.

results.title: Black Panther
results.brief_description: After his father’s death, T’Challa (Chadwick Boseman) returns home to Wakanda to inherit his throne and the mantle of the Black Panther. However, a powerful enemy related to his family threatens his nation and life in Marvel’s cinematic blockbuster.

constellations_other.name: Tracking cinema
constellations_other.description: A constellation looking at the evolution of the tracking / dolly shot.

results.description: King T’Challa returns home to the reclusive, technologically advanced African nation of Wakanda to serve as his country’s new leader. However, T’Challa soon finds that he is challenged for the throne by factions within his own country as well as without. Using powers reserved to Wakandan kings, T’Challa assumes the Black Panther mantle to join with ex-girlfriend Nakia, the queen-mother, his princess-kid sister, members of the Dora Milaje (the Wakandan ‘special forces’) and an American secret agent, to prevent Wakanda from being dragged into a world war.
description_for_label: King T’Challa returns home to the reclusive, technologically advanced African nation of Wakanda to serve as his country’s new leader. However, T’Challa soon finds that he is challenged for the throne by factions within his own country as well as without. Using powers reserved to Wakandan kings, T’Challa assumes the Black Panther mantle to join with ex-girlfriend Nakia, the queen-mother, his princess-kid sister, members of the Dora Milaje (the Wakandan ‘special forces’) and an American secret agent, to prevent Wakanda from being dragged into a world war.

results.title: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
results.creator_credit: House of Tomorrow, David Slade, Caroline Harris, Charlie Brooker, Catrin Meredydd and Russell McLean
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2018
results.brief_description: In 1984, a young programmer begins to question reality as he adapts a dark fantasy novel into a video game. A mind-bending tale with multiple endings.

constellations_other.name: The power of alternate endings
constellations_other.description: This Constellation about alternate perspectives, dream states, sitcoms and spin-offs was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.

results.creator_credit_for_label: House of Tomorrow, David Slade, Caroline Harris, Charlie Brooker, Catrin Meredydd and Russell McLean
results.headline_credit_for_label: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2018
results.description: In 1984, a young programmer begins to question reality as he adapts a dark fantasy novel into a video game. A mind-bending tale with multiple endings.
description_for_label: In 1984, a young programmer begins to question reality as he adapts a dark fantasy novel into a video game. A mind-bending tale with multiple endings.

results.title: Black Man's Houses
results.creator_credit: Open Channel Co-Operative and Steve Thomas
results.brief_description: Black Man’s Houses tells a dramatic story of the quest by Aboriginal people to reclaim the graves of their ancestors, who were exiled at Wybalenna on Flinders Island by the Van Diemen’s Land government, against a background of racism and denial.

constellations_other.name: Black documentary and truth telling
constellations_other.description: Essie Coffey was a trailblazer of Indigenous filmmaking, being the first Aboriginal woman to direct a documentary. The film spotlights the outspoken voice Coffey utilised to convey the realities faced by Aboriginal people and to encourage resistance to assimilation.

results.description: In 1832 the government of Van Diemen’s Land sent the last Aboriginal resistance fighters into exile at Wybalenna on Flinders Island, bringing an end to the Black War and opening a new chapter in the struggle for justice and survival by Tasmanian Aboriginal people. Black Man’s Houses tells a dramatic story of the quest by Aboriginal people to reclaim the graves of their ancestors against a background of racism and denial. Documenting a moving memorial re-enactment of the funeral of the great chief Manalargenna, the film also charts the cultural strength and resilience of his descendants as they are forced to fight for recognition in a society that is not ready to remember the terrible events of the past.
description_for_label: In 1832 the government of Van Diemen’s Land sent the last Aboriginal resistance fighters into exile at Wybalenna on Flinders Island, bringing an end to the Black War and opening a new chapter in the struggle for justice and survival by Tasmanian Aboriginal people. Black Man’s Houses tells a dramatic story of the quest by Aboriginal people to reclaim the graves of their ancestors against a background of racism and denial. Documenting a moving memorial re-enactment of the funeral of the great chief Manalargenna, the film also charts the cultural strength and resilience of his descendants as they are forced to fight for recognition in a society that is not ready to remember the terrible events of the past.

results.title: Black Divaz
results.brief_description: This documentary explores the inaugural Miss First Nations competition and goes beyond the glitz, glue guns and glamour of black drag in an intimate portrait of what it means to be an Indigenous drag queen today.

constellations_other.name: Joy of drag
constellations_other.description: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert is a groundbreaking Australian film with a small budget and big impact that's taken queer Australian stories to the world.

constellations_other.name: Gender bending larrikins
constellations_other.description: Australia has a long history with gender creativity and drag culture, both on screen and on stage.

results.description: It’s the Miss First Nations competition! Beyond the glitz, glue guns and glamour of black drag to reveal a fun, fabulous and sometimes fearful place. A sassy, intimate portrait of what it means to be an Indigenous Drag Queen today.
description_for_label: It’s the Miss First Nations competition! Beyond the glitz, glue guns and glamour of black drag to reveal a fun, fabulous and sometimes fearful place. A sassy, intimate portrait of what it means to be an Indigenous Drag Queen today.

results.title: Black Chicks Talking
results.brief_description: Performer and writer Leah Purcell talks with five dynamic Indigenous women - Rosanna Angus, Kathryn Hay, Deborah Mailman, Cilla Malone and Tammy Williams - about what it means to be Aboriginal in Australia today.

constellations_other.name: Women in charge
constellations_other.description: Across documentary, film, TV, and visual art, Aboriginal women have led how they will be represented on-screen.

results.description: Performer and writer Leah Purcell talks with five dynamic Indigenous women - Rosanna Angus, Kathryn Hay, Deborah Mailman, Cilla Malone and Tammy Williams - about what it means to be Aboriginal in Australia today. In a series of individual interviews and at one lively dinner party, the women share their experiences and opinions with extraordinary candour. The result is a passionate and challenging exploration of black identity and a celebration of five very different lives.
description_for_label: Performer and writer Leah Purcell talks with five dynamic Indigenous women - Rosanna Angus, Kathryn Hay, Deborah Mailman, Cilla Malone and Tammy Williams - about what it means to be Aboriginal in Australia today. In a series of individual interviews and at one lively dinner party, the women share their experiences and opinions with extraordinary candour. The result is a passionate and challenging exploration of black identity and a celebration of five very different lives.
